name: Free Cities
startIntroPart1: We saw bombs falling to the ground and destroying everything behind them, everything that could be destroyed, but it did not destroy us. We are alive and we are ready to restore what was destroyed.
startIntroPart2: Use your diplomatic capabilities to expand your influence and achieve a diplomatic victory!
declaringWar: It's time to free your Cities from corporate shackles.
attacked: Do you think you can crush our common people? No one will ever be able to do this, including you.
defeated: Just please, don't hurt our people...
introduction: We knew that we weren't the only ones who had survived this nightmare. Welcome to the Free Cities.
hateHello: Be careful in your actions. We have known your evil nature for a long time
denounced: You are a danger to us!
tradeRequest: We both stand to gain from this.
uniques: [Personnel] units gain the [Liberator of Cities] promotion
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
